Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Navippayuttaduka
Bāvīsaka (saindriya)
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Navippayuttaduka
Bāvīsaka (saindriya)
1778Navippayuttapaccayā nahetupaccayā (mūlakaṃ saṃkhittaṃ) naindriyapaccayā najhānapaccayā namaggapaccayā nasampayuttapaccayā nonatthipaccayā novigatapaccayā āhāre ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
1779Navippayuttamūlakaṃ.
